Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and exceed your expectations. This exceptional item is valued at $18000 to us, reflecting its high quality, functionality, and unique features. We believe it could be a perfect fit for you, offering unparalleled benefits that align with your requirements. Considering its worth and the value it can bring to you, I am extending this exclusive opportunity to acquire it for $17000. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of enhancing your experience with our product. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $17,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $17,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
